Name: SLICE
About the game: SLICE is a 2D game where you slice objects to solve puzzles. Slice through various unique levels full of mind-clicking experience. Use fun to explore gameplay mechanics to combine thinking with slicing. Key Features Minimalistic visual design Challenging and rewarding puzzles Light and Dark versions of levels Fun to discover gameplay mechanics Original, atmospheric music Meditative atmosphere 2 FREE additional contents 225 UNIQUE LEVELS in total Note: you should not do this if you want to solve the puzzle:
